0.name: Tampines Mall
0.layoutDescription: Small cubicle like room. Can fit two Muslims.
0.statusDescription: Opening Hours are as per Mall hours.
0.wudhuArea: Wudhu area is along the same corridor. Small, can only fit one at a time.
directions: Keep in mind that the Musollah is close to the main entrance lift lobby of the Mall.
Enter Tampines mall and head to level 3.
Walk past the lift lobby between shops 03-23 and 03-24 (Prism and Uniqlo as of writing) to the toilet entrance.
You will see a cubicle with no doors.
0.prayerItems: Yes. But advised to carry your own.

1.name: International Plaza
1.layoutDescription: Small open spaced area in a carpark lot.
1.statusDescription: Opening Hours are as per Mall hours.
1.wudhuArea: Wudhu to be taken in Toilet.
directions: Keep in mind that the lifts are confusing. Use the lift nearer to the main entrance that serves till level 10 only.
Head up to level 7 via the main entrance lift.
Walk out of the lift lobby and turn right.
You should see a glass block wall and some metal cupboards.
Be mindful to remove your shoes before stepping on to the wood veneers.
1.prayerItems: Yes. But advised to carry your own.

2.name: Singapore General Hospital (SGH) Surau
2.statusDescription: Opening Hours are as per Mall hours.
directions: In SGH Campus located behind Houseman's Canteen.
Muslimah entrance is located at the top of the stairs before Houseman's Canteen. However they can also access through the Muslimin entrance.
To access the Muslimin / Main entrance, walk towards Houseman's Canteen to where the carpark entrance is.
Walk up the slope past Houseman's Canteen. You should see the Surau Entrance.
2.prayerItems: Provided. But advised to carry your own.

3.name: Wisma Geylang Serai
3.layoutDescription: A large room with two separate rooms for Muslimin and Muslimah. Separate ablution area inside.
directions: Take the lift to level 3.
If you took the service lift, you should see NTUC Health as you exit the lift.
Turn right and there should be a view of the SingPost centre. Walk towards that direction and turn right again. You should see the musollah door.
If you took the glass lift, turn right and walk towards NTUC Health. It's right at the end.
3.prayerItems: Not provided. Please bring your own.

4.name: E!Hub
4.layoutDescription: Two small rooms with designated entrance for Muslimin and Muslimah.
directions: Locate E!Hub McDonalds at Level 1.
Once located, walk through between the McDonalds and the escalator.
It should lead you to the loading bay but do not go there.
The Muslimin entrance will be on your immediate right.
The Muslimah entrance is on the right turn after, towards the direction of the toilet.
4.prayerItems: Provided. But advised to carry your own.

5.name: Raffles City
5.layoutDescription: Separate entrance for Muslimin and Muslimah. Both within visible distance from each other.
5.statusDescription: Opening Hours follows mall operating hours.
directions: Get to level 2 and walk towards the direction of Fairmont Hotel Singapore.
If you came from the direction of Raffles City mall, you should see a fairly opened space with carpeted steps on your left.
Ahead, you should see the two false walls a distant apart.
Muslimah entrance on the left and Muslimin entrance on the right.
5.prayerItems: Provided. But advised to carry your own.
5.importantNotes: The male toilet has an ablution area made from the janitor room as of writing. Unfortunately there isn't one in the female toilet.

6.name: Singapore Expo
6.layoutDescription: Separate entrance for Muslimin and Muslimah.
6.statusDescription: Musollah / Prayer area is opened during Expo operation hours.
directions: Coming out from the Expo MRT station, turn left and walk into Expo.
As you enter the doors, you should see an escalator. Take the escalator if it's operational.
There is also a lift behind but it may not be operational most times.
The common option is to walk towards hall 1. Just before you enter hall 1 area, you should see a door with "Prayer Room" printed in purple on it.
Open the door and you'll see stairs.
Take the stairs up to second floor.
Turn right and walk straight. You should see the musollah along your left side.
6.prayerItems: Provided. But advised to carry your own.
